name: CONSTRUCT BREAKER V 0.5.6
description:
V 0.5.6 - May 26th 2018

  • - Launch Delay with Space Bar at Restart
  • - Proper Pause Menu
  • - Added Mute SFX Button
  • - Added AD Controls
Older Updates:

V 0.5.5 - May 24th 2018

  • - Added a Pause Button
  • - Added Music Volume Adjust
  • - Removed Touch/Mouse Controls for Arrow Keys
  • - Added New Fonts
  • - Removed Credits Page (useless)
  • - The Paddle is Now More Responsive
  • Also Working on Fixing Many Bugs.

V 0.5.4 - February 21st 2018 

  • - Added Particles when blocks destroyed
  • - New Trail Effect
  • - Touch Controls enabled (buggy still working on)
  • - New Font
  • - Credits Button (does Something)
  • - Removed Options Button (no reason to have it)
